channel.title: Mobile Payments
channel.description: Anyone know of a site or something that accepts mobile payments that will transfer over to my paypal account? I don't have a bank account either. Trying to make all possible ways of donating.

item.title: Mobile Payments
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:8, topic:462311”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=565264.msg4113881#msg4113881 date=1348823595]
Is there anyway I can do it in a more open way? Because I don’t have to pay taxes on the money anyway. I’ve $1300 in mobile credit (Don’t ask), it would be nice to transfer a big chunk of it back.
[/quote]

your parents will have to pay taxes on it if you are a minor profiting legally its not your money as you falsely registered for these companies stating you had been 18 years or older, your fucked.[/quote]
Looks like I’m fucked 'til I’m 18. 2 more gay years.

Read full topic

item.title: Mobile Payments
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

I do not need to pay taxes on it since it fall under the minimum sum for tax-payment. The mobile credit is legally obtained. There is nothing illegal with it. It is just the mobile company that doesn’t want to refund prepaid credit.

Read full topic

item.title: Mobile Payments
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:5, topic:462311”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=565264.msg4113877#msg4113877 date=1348822204]
transfer funds from one online currency to paypal is against the terms of service of paypal and you will be subjected to a ban.

[/quote]
Do you know about someone who would let you transfer to a bank account?
Onebip doesn’t let me insert money on my Onebip account.[/quote]

the problem when doing anything like that is it looks like tax evasion no company is going to say “Hey we understand your situation go ahead and do it” they are just going to ban you.

Read full topic

transfer funds from one online currency to paypal is against the terms of service of paypal and you will be subjected to a ban.
